class.rdfs:comment: A permit issued by an organization, e.g. a parking pass.
class.rdfs:label: Permit

schema:issuedBy.rdfs:comment: The organization issuing the ticket or permit.
schema:issuedBy.rdfs:label: issuedBy

schema:issuedThrough.rdfs:comment: The service through which the permit was granted.
schema:issuedThrough.rdfs:label: issuedThrough

schema:permitAudience.rdfs:comment: The target audience for this permit.
schema:permitAudience.rdfs:label: permitAudience

schema:validFor.rdfs:comment: The duration of validity of a permit or similar thing.
schema:validFor.rdfs:label: validFor

schema:validFrom.rdfs:comment: The date when the item becomes valid.
schema:validFrom.rdfs:label: validFrom

schema:validIn.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where a permit or similar thing is valid.
schema:validIn.rdfs:label: validIn

schema:validUntil.rdfs:comment: The date when the item is no longer valid.
schema:validUntil.rdfs:label: validUntil
